name: Button
description:
A customizable button component with different variants.

**Props:**
- `text`: The button text
- `onClick`: Function to call when button is clicked
- `variant`: Visual style ('primary', 'secondary', or 'danger')

**Example:**
```jsx
<Button 
  text="Click Me" 
  onClick={() => alert('Button clicked!')} 
  variant="primary" 
/>
```
